name: the-redirector
description: A template for kick starting a Cloudflare Workers project

scripts.dev: (trap 'kill 0' SIGINT; node staticpack.js worker.js index.js --watch & wrangler dev)
scripts.preview: (trap 'kill 0' SIGINT; node staticpack.js worker.js index.js --watch & wrangler preview --watch)

author: radiantly <44368997+radiantly@users.noreply.github.com>
